entry.value: Retrieve Kripo fragment identifiers which are similar query fragment.%%00010%%00010Based on KripoDB package (https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/kripodb)

from kripodb.canned import similarities%%00010%%00010queries = input_table['query_frag_id']%%00010distance_matrix_filename = '/data/kripo/tiny/distances.h5'%%00010cutoff = 0.55%%00010limit = 1000%%00010%%00010output_table = similarities(queries, %%00010 distance_matrix_filename, %%00010 cutoff,%%00010 limit)
